item.title: vExpert 2022
item.description: vExpert 2020 - 2022 I am very proud to be part of the VMware vExpert program. This is the third year that I was accepted into the program.

item.title: Welcome to www.vCROCS.info
item.description: Your Source for Automation/Monitoring/Logging Content I have learned a lot from the vCommunity, Powershell and PowerCLI web sites.
